summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW Inmate Detail Report for Jeffrey Epstein, dated August 13, 2019, showing his status as 'Inactive' and his location at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (NYM). The report includes his personal details, account balances, and indicates no current charges or security threat group data.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the Federal Bureau of Prisons inmate detail report, showing his incarceration details, status as 'Inactive', and account balances.

events.title: Inmate Detail Report Generated
events.description: A TRUVIEW Inmate Detail Report was generated for Jeffrey Epstein by the Federal Bureau of Prisons.

events.title: BOP Account Creation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's Bureau of Prisons account was created.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's status in the Bureau of Prisons system is listed as 'Inactive' as of August 13, 2019.
The report shows Epstein was held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (NYM), in quarters Z04-206LAD.
Epstein's TRUFACS (commissary) balance was $566.27, with zero balances in his phone and email accounts.
The report indicates 'No Data' for current charges and security threat groups.
The document is dated two days after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019, explaining the 'Inactive' status.
